entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
